extDescription.message: Repeat HTML5 videos on certain pages with video embedded. Make sure the video you are watching is HTML5; or the repeat is not supported. Currently support YouTube. For issues and feature requests, mail to: acee06.weichen@gmail.com.

optionStartLabel.message: Make the HTML5 Auto Repeat checkbox checked when loaded.

saveSuccess.description: The message popped to show when the options are saved successfully.
